dump_data_to_disk[source]

dump_data_to_disk(df, file_stem, databricks_url='https://ie-meta-prod-databricks-workspace.cloud.databricks.com', sep='\t')

Save a Pandas's Dataframe to disk and returns a URL where you can download it

file_stem: the location to save the file in the databricks file system. String must start with '/dbfs/FileStore/' databricks_url: is the URL for the Databricks environment being used. Defaults to the CZI workspace.

{% endraw %}
